page.title: 14Hunshelf's future?
page.content: Although this is a small rural area, there is a considerable amount of new development planned.A new water system is "in the pipeline" and there is to be a new television mast to improve reception of Channel 4,although public opinion is generally that reception is good enough already. The Council intend to resurface roads and improve pavements,and there is a plan to set up a picnic area for weekend motorists.A new housing estate is on the drawing board.Probably the biggest project for the future is the building of the Stocksbridge by-pass. The face of Hunshelf seems set to change soon.Will it be entirely a change for the better-or will the alterations destroy the character and landscape of Hunshelf?
